txt.en: Talk to Ingmar in the Mead Hall of Eaworth
Ingbert has instructed you to lend his son Ingmar your full support as he makes preparations for the attack on Maustazg.

'I thank you for your efforts on my behalf, [placeholder]. Despite my grandmother's reservations, the garnering of glory is NOT my main intent. The defence of my people is at the heart of my plan, and the best defence... well, I am sure you know my meaning.

'Before we can assault the Orcs at Maustazg, however, we must know their true strength. For this purpose, I would have you ride a patrol through the Vale. Let me mark your points upon your map....

'There... go swiftly and safely, my friend.'
Ingmar has asked you to ride a patrol through the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should patrol the first point for signs of the Enemy.

'Well done, [placeholder]... it was wise thinking for your part when you brought mayhem down upon the heads of the Orcs. Now they will be in greater disarray when we attack.\n\n'Our preparations are now complete!'
Ingmar has asked you to ride a patrol through the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should patrol the second point for signs of the Enemy.
Ingmar has asked you to ride a patrol through the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should patrol the third point for signs of the Enemy.
Ingmar has asked you to ride a patrol through the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should patrol the fourth point for signs of the Enemy.
Ingmar has asked you to ride a patrol through the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should patrol the final point for signs of the Enemy.
Ingmar is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should return to Ingmar with news of your success.
